    • Method Detail

      • addMessageObserver

        public void addMessageObserver(int chatId,
                               @NonNull
                               androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner,
                               @NonNull
                               androidx.lifecycle.Observer<? super java.util.List<ChatMessage>> observer)
        Register as an observer to listen to a specific chat room's list of messages.
        Parameters:
        chatId - the chatid of the chat to observer
        owner - the fragments lifecycle owner
        observer - the observer

      • getMessageListByChatId

        public java.util.List<ChatMessage> getMessageListByChatId(int chatId)
        Return a reference to the List<> associated with the chat room. If the View Model does not have a mapping for this chatID, it will be created. WARNING: While this method returns a reference to a mutable list, it should not be mutated externally in client code. Use public methods available in this class as needed.
        Parameters:
        chatId - the id of the chat room List to retrieve
        Returns:
        a reference to the list of messages

      • getFirstMessages

        public void getFirstMessages(int chatId,
                             java.lang.String jwt)
        Makes a request to the web service to get the first batch of messages for a given Chat Room. Parses the response and adds the ChatMessage object to the List associated with the ChatRoom. Informs observers of the update. Subsequent requests to the web service for a given chat room should be made from getNextMessages()
        Parameters:
        chatId - the chatroom id to request messages of
        jwt - the users signed JWT

      • getNextMessages

        public void getNextMessages(int chatId,
                            java.lang.String jwt)
        Makes a request to the web service to get the next batch of messages for a given Chat Room. This request uses the earliest known ChatMessage in the associated list and passes that messageId to the web service. Parses the response and adds the ChatMessage object to the List associated with the ChatRoom. Informs observers of the update. Subsequent calls to this method receive earlier and earlier messages.
        Parameters:
        chatId - the chatroom id to request messages of
        jwt - the users signed JWT

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(int chatId,
                       ChatMessage message)
        When a chat message is received externally to this ViewModel, add it with this method.
        Parameters:
        chatId -
        message -
